infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs location access to track delivery routes and provide GPS tracking for drivers.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs background location access to continuously track driver locations during deliveries.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app needs location access to track delivery routes even when the app is in the background.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Trucking Driver to use your location to track deliveries and provide navigation assistance.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow Trucking Driver to use your location in the background for continuous delivery tracking.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow Trucking Driver to use your location for delivery tracking and navigation.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Trucking Driver to access camera for taking delivery proof photos.
